name: DarkNG
description: DarkNG is a simple CSS theme that turns the BeamNG website into a more appealing, dark interface.

user.name: Hookens
user.about: I made a dark theme, that's about it.

additional_info: Unfortunately, some parts may still be bright due to them containing images. Consdering the Wiki is getting reworked, the theme isn't compatible with it. It is compatible with the documentation however.
